metadata.title: CVE-2013-6954 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The png_do_expand_palette function in libpng before 1.6.8 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference andapplication crash) via (1) a PLTE chunk of zero bytes or (2) a NULLpalette, related to pngrtran.c and pngset.c.

criterions.comment: openjdk-7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
